text: Hi all, I was told by HubSpot support that jQuery is automatically loaded into templates. However, I'm trying to run a script and I'm getting "$ is not defined" in the console. I'm trying to apply the jQuery to a custom form module and tried adding the script to the module itself and a separate JS file. Any ideas why this is happening?

Anyway I can set a form field value in a form the uses iframe. I've done it before with this, on a form not in an iframe <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

Client doesn't have access to use forms as raw HTML.
